title: Drawing, "Chair Designs, W. and J.", early 20th century
medium: Graphite, yellow, red and green pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: W. AND J. SLOANE MODERN UPHOLSTERY LINE FALL 1935.; at left margin: 6/7/8/9/10[each circled]; at lower left: G8 Inscribed in graphite with design numbers throughout Inscribed in yellow pencil at lower center: L O H [followed by doodles]
description: Description: 4 tables, 3 cabinets, 2 chairs, 2 sectional piece chairs, 1 mirror Deskey numbers reading from upper center horizontally: 9215, 9217, 9023, 9020, 9220, 9025, 9225, 9226, 9022, 9021, 9027, 9026

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chair Designs, W. and J.", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, yellow, red and green pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-181.
